name: Mazing (itch)
description:
Designer and Programmer: Thomas Finch

Artist and Assistant Designer: Jeremy Lowther 

In Mazing, you play as Urgh the caveman. His brother wandered into a cave and didn't come out. You traverse the mazes of these strange caves, collected Bones to trade for useful items. The deeper you get, the stranger the caves become. 

INSTRUCTIONS:

- Get as much money as you can.

- Reach the end of the 'maze' with the key.

- Don't die.

- WASD moves the player.

- Space Bar or E attacks.

- The game is currently infinite.

KNOWN ISSUES:

- Perspective/Depth Issues

- You are able to attack enemies through a wall tile currently. This is unintended.

PLANNED FEATURES BEFORE EARLY ACCESS:

- More enemies

- Items (Club, Axe, Torch, etc)

- Walls that can be burned down with the torch item

- Lighting System

- Walls that can be broken down with the club

- A store in between rooms in which you can spend your bones (money)

- More items

- More HUD art

- Daily Challenge

- Gamepad Support

- Water Tiles
